Overview

History has proven that anti-gun advocates always use completely rational and factual arguments to attack gun owners and their rights. So here is an equally rational rebuttal.

In 2013, there were 672 dolphin rapes recorded in the United States although the number of victims is believed to be exponentially higher because of dolphins threatening to re-abuse outspoken victims.

Our campaign “Guns Prevent Dolphin Rape” is the first step in the right direction.

We are truly disappointed that people want to restrict gun ownership in the United States. It is time we accept that we have a serious problem with dolphin rape, and firearm ownership is the only resolution.

You can’t blow a rape whistle under water.


Quotes

“I was snorkeling with my beautiful wife when out of no where a dolphin viciously assaulted her vagina with its nose. Luckily, I had my trusty musket to disable the dolphin before serious harm was done. This aggression will not stand, man”
Benjamin Franklin (1779)
